A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A beautiful looking movie\, so the critics will enjoy that. But can we make now a Star Wars movie? Or at least don't call this episode 8\, if Rian needed to do his spin on the SW lore. This doesn't follow any internal pre-established characters or aspects of the situation we're in (considering it follows TFA about a week or so). What was set up in the original trilogy or in TFA is gone now.
